author: 0x_qz
content: Hi, I am trying to launch a new devnet-7 node by following this link: https://github.com/jimmygchen/eip4844-devnet, but it failed to start the sync and report the following error, does anyone know how to resolve it?

author: 0x_qz
content:
"geth_1        | WARN [08-07|03:16:49.565] Served engine_newPayloadV3               conn=172.18.0.3:33508     reqid=1 duration="66.783Âµs"  err="Invalid parameters"                     errdata="{Error:nil excessBlobGas post-cancun}"
lighthouse_1  | Aug 07 03:16:49.565 WARN Execution engine call failed            error: ServerMessage { code: -32602, message: "Invalid parameters" }, service: exec
lighthouse_1  | Aug 07 03:16:49.565 WARN Error whilst processing payload status  error: Api { error: ServerMessage { code: -32602, message: "Invalid parameters" } }, service: exec"

author: jimmygchen
content: Hi, I ran into the same issue a couple of days ago, it looks like the geth / lighthouse versions on the devnet branches are no longer compatible, might need to go with older client versions if you'd like to test on devnet 7. I'll quickly check if the devnet7 client versions are documented anywhere

author: jimmygchen
content:
I've pushed a `devnet-7 branch` here that uses the same commits as what EF devops uses for devnet-7 (https://github.com/ethpandaops/4844-testnet/blob/master/ansible/inventories/devnet-7/group_vars/all/images.yaml), still compiling on my machine but feel free to give it a try:
https://github.com/jimmygchen/eip4844-devnet/tree/devnet-7
